text: \define toolmap(word) \rules except wikilink <$wikify name="input" text="https://dynalist.io/d/zUP-nIWu2FFoXH-oM7L7d9DM#q=$word$"> > target="_blank">$word$ \end Search in Tiddlywiki Toolmap: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/search-toolmap" field="keywords" placeholder="search toolmap"/> <$macrocall $name="toolmap" word={{$:/temp/search-toolmap!!keywords}} />
creator: Mohammad
title: Search Tiddlywiki Toolmap
